mapper.select: SELECT res.res_no, res.id, mem.name, mem.tel, res.prod_no, pro.prod_name, res.res_date, pro.prod_price_adult, res.res_adult, pro.prod_price_child, res.res_child, res.res_price, pro.prod_detail, res.res_desc FROM reservation_tbl res, member_tbl mem, product_tbl pro WHERE res.id = mem.id AND res.prod_no = pro.prod_no AND res.id = #{id} AND mem.pw = #{pw} AND mem.authority = 'g'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member_tbl WHERE id=#{id} AND authority = 'g'
